new_entities_discovered.name: Lawrence Krauss
new_entities_discovered.role: Arizona State physicist, Origins Project founder. 27 documents in archive. Close Epstein associate who organized conferences and defended Epstein. Resigned from ASU 2018 over misconduct allegations.

new_entities_discovered.name: Marvin Minsky
new_entities_discovered.role: MIT AI Lab co-founder, AI pioneer. Named in victim allegations - victim directed to have sex with him. 42 documents. Died 2016.

new_entities_discovered.name: Danny Hillis
new_entities_discovered.role: Computer scientist, Thinking Machines founder, Applied Minds. Edge Foundation member. 13 documents in Epstein archive.

new_entities_discovered.name: George Church
new_entities_discovered.role: Harvard geneticist, received Epstein funding for research. 33 documents. Met with Epstein multiple times.

new_entities_discovered.name: Frank Wilczek
new_entities_discovered.role: MIT physicist, Nobel laureate 2004. Participated in Epstein-funded Origins Project events.

new_entities_discovered.name: Stuart Russell
new_entities_discovered.role: UC Berkeley AI researcher. Participated in Lawrence Krauss Origins Project AI workshop 2017.

new_entities_discovered.name: Kirsty MacKenzie
new_entities_discovered.role: BBC Today Programme Interviews Editor. March 2011 requested Epstein interview about Prince Andrew stories.
